channel.title: How?
channel.description:
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("stafflist")) { c.sendMessage("@red@Owner:@red@"); c.sendMessage("@dbl@Fernando@dbl@"); c.sendMessage("@red@Co-Owner:@red@"); c.sendMessage("@dbl@OPEN@dbl@"); c.sendMessage("@red@Mods:@red@"); c.sendMessage("@dbl@OPEN@dbl@"); c.sendMessage("@red@Admins:@red@"); c.sendMessage("@dbl@OPEN@dbl@"); }
Okay well that's the code. When someone/I do that, it says it in the chatbox. How can I make it so It will bring it up in a book, or something better like a scroll?

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Try something like this.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("stafflist")){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Title", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Sub-Title", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Staff List", 8147); c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }

Change the colors if you’d like.
Black is:

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:6, topic:413375”]If it’s PI, try something like this.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("stafflist")){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("Title", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Sub-Title", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Staff List", 8147); c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }

The line id’s should be concurring in order.
Ex:
8146
8147
8149
etc.[/quote]
You are amazing! Thank you so much! Haha. If I could rep I would! But one more question do you know how I could like color the words in the code?

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

If it’s PI, try something like this.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("stafflist")){ c.getPA().sendFrame126("Title", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Sub-Title", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Staff List", 8147); c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }

The line id’s should be concurring in order.
Ex:
8146
8147
8149
etc.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:


I Got some errors but only 9! (: I Even tried this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“stafflist”)) {
showInterface(14);
c.sendQuest("@red@Owner: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Fernando ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Co Owner/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Admin/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Mod/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN: ,LineID");
}
Put a number in there, but still 9 errors

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“stafflist”)) {
showInterface(ID);
c.sendQuest("@red@Owner: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Fernando ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Co Owner/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Admin/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@red@Mod/s: ,LineID");
c.sendQuest("@dbl@OPEN: ,LineID");
}

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:2, topic:413375”]c.sendQuest(“TEXT,LineID”);

You also need to add showInterface(ID);[/quote] Could you do an example using my code? I’m still learning, and this would be great.

Read full topic
